title: Port scanning error on Render
body:
Hi eveyone,

I currently have a twitter Eliza agent working perfectly on the localhost but on render is returns a No Ports found error.
I have try the following:
- Change the SERVER_PORT to PORT in .env and render environment.... same error
- added both SERVER_PORT and PORT to the environment variable, updated the index.ts to include process.env.PORT || SERVER_PORT || '3000'... same error.
-I'd appreciate any help i can get or alternative for render deployment.

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @Etette! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!

title: Client shows blank page and errors
body:
**Describe the bug**

Followed instructions to install, agent starts correctly, started client but shows blank page and errors in console.

errors:
Uncaught SyntaxError: The requested module '/node_modules/.vite/deps/react-router.js?v=14e27ee7' does not provide an export named 'NavLink' (at app-sidebar.tsx:17:10


**To Reproduce**


git clone https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza.git
cd eliza
git checkout $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0)
pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile
pnpm build

< created new character file and .env>
<started character>
<character server starts without error>
runs pnpm start:client in a new tab

opens tab to 'http://localhost:5174/'
blank page

browser console shows:

```
Unable to set window.solana, try uninstalling Phantom.
=@ inpage.js:26
inpage.js:26 Unable to set window.phantom.solana, try uninstalling Phantom.
@ inpage.js:26
app-sidebar.tsx:17 
Uncaught SyntaxError: The requested module '/node_modules/.vite/deps/react-router.js?v=14e27ee7' does not provide an export named 'NavLink' (at app-sidebar.tsx:17:10
:5173/assets/js/index.CucWK6IV.js:1 
        
        
       GET http://localhost:5173/ net::ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED
ping @ client:736
waitForSuccessfulPing @ client:749
(anonymous) @ client:561
        
       GET http://localhost:5173/ net::ERR_NETWORK_IO_SUSPENDED
```




http://localhost:5173/


**Expected behavior**

The client should start and display chat with agent.

**Screenshots**


**Additional context**
commit 81a35281b93d5e8ca0745e9d13a1943e9a90681b
tag: v0.25.6-alpha.1

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @kon-rad! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
